title: Statement Polki Diamond Ring with Smoky Quartz Accents
materials: Gold accents in the polki setting.
features: A modern ring featuring a rectangular design. It showcases three rectangular pieces of Smoky Quartz framed by sparkling melee diamonds. In the center there's a floral arrangement of Polki diamonds set in gold. The contrasting color of the smoky quartz and the brilliance of the polki diamonds create a stunning focal point.
occasions: and making a bold statement at contemporary events. Suitable as a cocktail ring.
description: This ring is a fusion of modern design and traditional Polki diamond setting. The smoky quartz provides a unique contrast to the brilliance of the diamonds making it an eye catching piece. A perfect statement piece for those who appreciate unique designs and quality craftsmanship.
